events.title: Minnesota Lawmaker Assassinated
events.description: Minnesota Rep. Melissa Hortman was killed and state Sen. John Hoffman injured in targeted shootings.

events.title: Air India Plane Crash Death Toll Rises
events.description: The death toll from the Air India plane crash has risen to 270.

events.title: Israel and Iran Resume Missile Strikes
events.description: Israel and Iran have resumed missile strikes, deepening the ongoing conflict.

events.title: Trump Administration Considers Travel Ban Expansion
events.description: The Trump administration is considering adding 36 countries to its travel ban.

events.title: ‘No Kings’ Protester Killed in Utah
events.description: A ‘No Kings’ demonstrator was shot and killed at a protest in Utah.

events.title: Trump Returns to G7 Amidst Rift With Allies
events.description: As Trump returns to the G7, rifts with allies have deepened.

events.title: Netanyahu Reveals Iran's Assassination Plot Against Trump
events.description: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu reveals Iran marked Trump as 'enemy number one' with an assassination plot.
